entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 60 to 90 mm of rain. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 20 km east of the main divide. Note, another period of heavy rain is expected overnight Thursday and Friday morning. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow overnight Wednesday and Thursday morning, and up to 1 cm may accumulate on the road above 700 metres. Further snow is likely overnight Thursday into Friday.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow overnight Wednesday and Thursday morning, and 1 to 3 cm may accumulate on the road above 700 metres. Further snow is likely Thursday night.
